omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
with results as (
	select 
		distinct
			(select top 1 PatientId from omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics d where d.PatientSer = dc.PatientSer) as PatientId,
			dc.DiagnosisCode,
			dc.DateStamp as event_start_date,
			dc.DateStamp as event_end_date
	from omop_staging.RTDS_5_Diagnosis_Course dc
	where dc.DiagnosisTableName = 'ICD-10'
)
select
	PatientId,
	DiagnosisCode,
	event_start_date,
	event_end_date
from results
where
    PatientId is not null
    and patientid not like '%[^0-9]%';

omopColumns.name: condition_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Resolve ICD10 codes to standard or non standard OMOP concepts. If code cannot be mapped, map using the parent code.
omopColumns.query:
with results as (
	select 
		distinct
			(select top 1 PatientId from omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics d where d.PatientSer = dc.PatientSer) as PatientId,
			dc.DiagnosisCode,
			dc.DateStamp as event_start_date,
			dc.DateStamp as event_end_date
	from omop_staging.RTDS_5_Diagnosis_Course dc
	where dc.DiagnosisTableName = 'ICD-10'
)
select
	PatientId,
	DiagnosisCode,
	event_start_date,
	event_end_date
from results
where
    PatientId is not null
    and patientid not like '%[^0-9]%';

omopColumns.name: condition_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Maps concepts to standard valid concepts in the `condition` domain.

omopColumns.name: condition_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. `EHR Administration record`
